channel.title: Vim on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on David J Nevin

item.title: Vale Lint Setup
item.description: Vale Prose Linting With sphinx up and running, the next step is getting the prose linter setup and configured.

item.title: Vim as Python IDE
item.description: Vim setup: The never-ending story Joy! I’ve gotten my Python virtual environment set up, installed Flake8() and managed to trouble-shoot a problem with the Syntastic auto-running of Flake8() on save.

item.title: Where I'm at
item.description: It’s been a full few days The Educative OOP course is almost done.

item.title: Implementing A Child Class
item.description: A Banking Class Example Following the tutorials in Educative I wrote my first class with inheritance.

item.title: Terminal Tweaks
item.description: Time to Tweak the Terminal Having played around with and gotten some comfort level with Vim with VS Code, I feel it’s time to start exploring using Vim from the terminal.

item.title: Taking Stock
item.description: Vim Update I’m feeling more comfortable using Vim these last few days, although I admit the arrow keys are getting too much attention.

item.title: Vim Commands
item.description: Too Many Vim Commands Getting back into Vim again and decided this time to take it slower and get the basics well in place before I try and incorporate too many commands.

item.title: Binary Search Extended
item.description: Binary Search Recommended Youtube Playlist Binary searching has been a difficult learning curve for me.
